backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the backend that manages user profiles, electricians, work orders, payments, and job applications with role-based access control via mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that the 'Work Order' tab in WorkOrders.tsx was moved to appear under the 'Verify Application' section instead of the 'Verify' section.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose and notable recent changes.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file that defines Tailwind base imports and OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets the page title to 'Technical Tech' and mounts the React app via the root div and main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router app setup with lazy-loaded page routes, QueryClient provider, ThemeProvider defaulting to dark mode, and a public /my-bookings route alongside protected admin routes.
frontend/src/components/ApplicationStatu: Badge component that maps ApplicationProcessStatus enum values to color-coded CSS classes and human-readable labels including a 'Verified – Awaiting Assignment' state.
frontend/src/components/AppSidebar.tsx: Sidebar navigation component rendering Portal and Admin link groups with active-state highlighting and dark styling via sidebar-dark CSS class.
frontend/src/components/JobApplicationSt: Multi-step progress indicator component displaying a progress bar, step dots, and step labels for job application flows.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Empty file with no content, likely a placeholder for a future language selector component.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component wrapping the app with a sidebar and sticky header that includes Internet Identity login/logout functionality and displays the user's principal.
Simple full-screen loading spinner component used as a fallback during lazy-loaded route transitions.
frontend/src/components/PaymentStatusBad: Renders a styled badge for payment status values (paid/pending) using CSS class mappings.
frontend/src/components/PriorityBadge.ts: Renders a styled badge for numeric priority levels (1–4: Low, Medium, High, Urgent) with corresponding CSS classes.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that shows a login prompt if the user is unauthenticated, a spinner while initializing, or renders child routes via Outlet when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/RatingDisplay.ts: Displays a read-only 5-star rating with optional review count, supporting small and medium sizes.
frontend/src/components/RatingInput.tsx: Interactive 5-star rating input with hover effects and an optional comment textarea for submitting reviews.
frontend/src/components/StatusBadge.tsx: Renders a styled badge for work order statuses (open, inProgress, completed, cancelled) using CSS class mappings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, identity persistence, and delegation validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions, including CRUD operations for user profiles, electricians, and work orders with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Provides a translation context and hook supporting multiple languages with session storage persistence and English fallback for missing keys.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines English and Hindi translation strings for all UI text across the app, including navigation, landing page, services, job board, and other sections.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities, defines CSS custom properties for the dark-themed design system, and provides badge utility classes for statuses and priorities.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class merging, label/class lookups for work order statuses, payment statuses, priorities, specialities, and qualifications, plus helpers for formatting timestamps and calculating electrician ratings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page that displays summary stats (total orders, completed, electricians, revenue) and a recent orders table using data fetched from work orders and electricians queries.
frontend/src/pages/Electricians.tsx: Electricians management page that lists all electricians with their ratings and provides dialogs for adding, editing, and deleting electrician records.
frontend/src/pages/JobBoard.tsx: Displays open work orders as a searchable job listing page where users can apply for jobs and subscribe to job alerts, with login prompts for unauthenticated actions.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with a hero banner, feature highlights, and service category cards linking to the services and jobs pages.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookings.tsx: Shows the current user's work order bookings split into ongoing and past orders, with accept/decline actions for verified-pending assignments.
frontend/src/pages/Payments.tsx: Admin payments dashboard displaying revenue summary cards and a list of work orders with an editable dialog to update payment amount, method, and status.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Service booking form where customers select a service type, fill in job details and contact info, and submit a new work order via the backend.
frontend/src/pages/WorkOrders.tsx: React page component for managing work orders, providing tabbed views, search, and dialogs for status updates, ratings, and application verification using various query hooks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking an existing feature and a pending fix request to move the 'Work Order' tab option under the 'Verify Application' section in the Work Orders page.
